(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
/l10n/

\.crt$
\.gif$

\.lock$

\.mod$

\.odp$

\.odt$

\.star$
\.svg$
\.ttf$
\.wav$
\.woff$

^AUTHORS$
^changelog/[^/]*_
^tests/acceptance/filesForUpload/
^tests/data/
